sentences.sContent: I made a booking for two double rooms.
sentences.sCn: 我预订了两个双人房间。

sentences.sContent: I’m calling to confirm my booking (=  say definitely that I want to travel etc  ) .
sentences.sCn: 我打电话是想确认一下我的预订。

sentences.sContent: If you cancel your booking , there will be a small charge.
sentences.sCn: 如果你取消预订，就要付一小额费用。

sentences.sContent: Places on the course are limited and advance booking is essential.
sentences.sCn: 课程名额有限，必须预订。

phrases.pCn: （演员等的）经纪人；（机票，戏票等的）人

words.tran: 书籍；卷；帐簿；名册；工作簿

trans.tranOther: an arrangement to travel by train, use a hotel room etc at a particular time in the future
